about_the_game:
Own the soundtrack for Cylinder: Puzzles Returned! Some of these tracks have been re-imagined from the original game, along with some fresh additions. There are a variety of vibes and everything is dense with melodic textures. All tracks composed by Hasan DuRant and Kevin Allen.

Each track is lovingly crafted and is quite the Bop. Add this excellent album to your music collection today!
